downloadTitle: Enterprise Services Process Library (ESPL) White Paper
downloadDescription: This whitepaper focuses specifically on the challenges faced by Enterprise Services, a business segment within Services that provides support to enterprise-level customers.
detailsSection: Microsoft Services is a diverse, worldwide organization of more than 18,000 employees, unified by one mission: to lead and serve our customers and partners as they realize their full potential through Microsoft software and services. We provide the right resources for any stage of a company's IT life cycle — from strategic guidance, technology consulting and enterprise support — to help them efficiently run their business. (Download the white paper for more detail.)
installInstructionSection: Click the Download button (above) to download the white paper.
